display_long_description:
You Can’t Scare Me is a haunted house party game- meet up with friends to try to scare them, and if they scream, you get a point! It’s either a jump scare or a laugh riot, but either way it’s a scary good time!

There are 2 teams:
Haunters try to scare the Haunted using scare traps and costumes- they can see and hear everyone.
Haunted collects keys and tries not to scream- they can hear the Haunters but can't see them unless they appear as a monster!

The 50 scare traps have a ton of monsters, sounds & cool effects- lots of common fears!

Haunt 8 levels- a mansion, a cemetery, a hospital, a fair & more. Play a small map for a fast scare, or a big one for a mega match. Each has an unlockable costume for multiplayer!

In multiplayer, you can summon your Meta friends to play. When playing against humans, you never know what's coming next!
Single player lets you play a level with randomized traps- use it to study the level so you’ll know the best spots on the map.
Party mode lets you place traps, then pass the headset to a friend to play.

Please note, this game uses legacy Meta avatar presets for player avatars.

From our players:
“If you are looking for a social VR game that blends horror with fun, [this] is a fantastic choice that offers hours of scary (and hilarious) moments.”
Blake

“This one is endless fun because with LIVE scarers... it can never become predictable.  We had great fun in this game, and spent hours in there scaring each other.”
muggito
